transcripts.text: We command all satanic pregnancies to miscarry right now.  We declare that anything that's been conceived in satanic wombs, that it'll miscarry.  This is all wrong.

Paula White, the spiritual advisor to Donald Trump and mistress of Benny Hinn, has just said one of the most insane things I've ever heard in my life.  And that's saying a lot because I've seen Charlie Sheen give an interview before.  It's called Charlie Sheen.  Now, Paula White is a charismatic, and she is all the time posting crazy things on Twitter.  And really, she's just a fruit of spirituality that's not bound by any doctrinal system.  I mean, if it sounds spiritual, just say it.  But she was doing something recently in a church service where she was praying.  And just listen to this for a second.
Any hex, any spell, any witchcraft, any spirit of control, any Jezebel, any spirit of control, any Jezebel.
That's ironic.  Anything that the enemy desires to... Okay, so they're just praying in a church service.  But towards the end, this is what she says.  I want you to hear this for just a second.
Pride fall in the name of Jesus.  We command all satanic pregnancies to miscarry right now.  We declare that anything that's been conceived in satanic wombs, that it'll miscarry.
It will not be able to carry forth any plan of destruction, any plan of harm.
What?  What?  This is literally crazy.  Are you people insane?

What do you say to stuff like that?  I mean, I bet you that Jeffrey Dahmer could watch that and be like, that's messed up.  And the truth is that charismatic Christianity exalts experience over doctrine.  When you say things like that, you're not quoting any Bible concept.  There is nothing like that in the scriptures.  Matter of fact, everybody in the scriptures who desired for children to die was evil.  And I think maybe Paula White told on herself here.  This woman is not being led by the Holy Spirit.  This woman is not bound by any doctrinal system.  She just exalts experience over doctrine.  She's trouble.  She has a long history of immorality.  She has no holiness in her life.  She is a charlatan.  These people are dangerous because they say just enough.  that sounds right to be convincing, but then they say just enough.  that's wrong to be catastrophic to your spirituality.  I guess maybe she's talking figuratively here.  Maybe that's what she means by this.  But even still, oh Lord woman, what is wrong with you?

Here's what you need to know.  There are people out there who are rank heretics, who are charlatans, who are liars, who are literally, as 2 Corinthians chapter 11 says, ministers of Satan.  They are deceiving the masses because they themselves have been deceived.  These people tell lies so many times that they end up actually believing their own lies.  This is not Christianity.  This is a form of spiritism that is detached from Bible truth.  And you need to know that.
We declare that anything that's been conceived in satanic wombs, that it'll miscarry.
what is the matter with you?

so stop buying her books.  stop following her sermons.  if you're in her church you need to get out of that church.  you need to leave and go somewhere where they actually teach the bible preach the bible.  i mean let's play it again for you for just one last time satanic pregnancies to miscarry.  right now like at this point paula white is making charles manson look sane.  i just can't believe this this.  i don't know if i'm more sorry for her as a person for actually saying and believing stuff like that or if i'm more sorry for the people that follow her.  but then again what do i know?  i'm just a guy with the bible here.
